sentences.en: Being resolved on renunciation, on freedom from ill will, on harmlessness.
sentences.cn: 出离思惟、无嗔思惟 、 无害思惟.

sentences.en: But an illness of life, is not renunciation first and foremost an illness of the spirit?
sentences.cn: 但是摆脱生活的疾病, 首先要脱离的不是灵魂的疾病.

sentences.en: Few of them understood that the renunciation of self is its own reward.
sentences.cn: 他们很少懂得舍弃自我就是酬报.

sentences.en: Gandhi exemplified the virtues of renunciation, asceticism and restraint.
sentences.cn: 甘地体现了克己、禁欲和自我约束的美德。

sentences.en: He had been impressed by their devotion and purity, their self - control and renunciation.
sentences.cn: 他被他们的热情和纯洁, 自制 和弃绝所吸引.

sentences.en: It is a lesson in renunciation which I suppose I ought to learn at this seaon.
sentences.cn: 我想这是现在我应该尽力作到的一种克己工夫.

sentences.en: It is a lesson in renunciation which I suppose I ought to learn at this season.
sentences.cn: 我想这是现在我应该尽力学到的一种克己工夫.

sentences.en: It was Marcus who made the most of his renunciation of his cousin.
sentences.cn: 其实,八成是马革士自己情愿放弃他表妹的.

sentences.en: Nuclear weapons would be renounced only after a renunciation of the threat of war in diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 只有在外交上不使用战争威胁才能不使用核武器.

sentences.en: Renunciation of pleasure has always been very hard to man.
sentences.cn: 摒弃快乐对人来说总是不易做到的.

sentences.en: Swamiji has led a life renunciation at the age of 8 , he met his guru.
sentences.cn: 并不是有人让你去分享, 而是一种发自内心的声音驱使你这么去做.

sentences.en: The renunciation of all earthly pleasures.
sentences.cn: 对所有的世俗享乐的摒弃.

sentences.en: The talks were dependent on a renunciation of terrorism.
sentences.cn: 会谈以放弃恐怖主义为前提。

sentences.en: To me it was his broken spirit that expressed itself, and I rebelled against his renunciation.
sentences.cn: 这一番话听着象是他意志消沉的自白, 我不同意他这种自暴自弃的态度.

sentences.en: Total dedication to God, renunciation of possessions, the family.
sentences.cn: 对神完全忠诚, 出家意味着抛弃全部的财产, 还有家人.
